                      AffinityTopologyVersion topVer,
                      UUID nearNodeId,
                      GridCacheVersion nearXidVer,
                      IgniteUuid nearFutId,

                      TransactionIsolation isolation,
                      long timeout,
                      boolean invalidate,
                      boolean storeEnabled,
                      boolean onePhaseCommit,
                      int txSize,
                      Map<UUID,Collection<UUID>> txNodes,
                      UUID subjId,
                      int taskNameHash)
        Parameters:
        nearNodeId - Near node ID that initiated transaction.
        nearXidVer - Near transaction ID.
        nearFutId - Near future ID.
        nearMiniId - Near mini future ID.
        nearThreadId - Near thread ID.
        implicit - Implicit flag.
        implicitSingle - Implicit-with-single-key flag.
        cctx - Cache context.
        concurrency - Concurrency.
        isolation - Isolation.
        timeout - Timeout.
        storeEnabled - Store enabled flag.
        txSize - Expected transaction size.
        txNodes - Transaction nodes mapping.
